name: getReportingSurveysIdQuestionsId
description: Get report for a survey question.

fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

exclude_fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

question_id.description: The ID of the survey question.

$block: The details of a survey question's report.

$ul: **average_rating**: The average rating for this range question.
**contact_counts**: For email question types, how many are new, known, or unknown contacts.
**known**: The number of known contacts that responded to this survey.
**new**: The number of new contacts that responded to this survey.
**unknown**: The number of unknown contacts that responded to this survey.
**has_other**: Whether this survey question has an 'other' option.
**id**: The ID of the survey question.
**is_required**: Whether this survey question is required to answer.
**merge_field**: A [merge field](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/merge-fields/) for an audience.
**id**: An unchanging id for the merge field.
**label**: The [label](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/merge-fields/#structure) for the merge field.
**type**: The [type](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/merge-fields/#structure) for the merge field.
**options**: The answer choices for this question.
**other_label**: Label used for the 'other' option of this survey question.
**placeholder_label**: Placeholder text for this survey question's answer box.
**query**: The query of the survey question.
**range_high_label**: Label for the high end of the range.
**range_low_label**: Label for the low end of the range.
**subscribe_checkbox_enabled**: Whether the subscribe checkbox is shown for this email question.
**subscribe_checkbox_label**: Label used for the subscribe checkbox for this email question.
**survey_id**: The unique ID of the survey.
**total_responses**: The total number of responses to this question.
**type**: The response type of the survey question.

$block: An error generated by the Mailchimp API. Conforms to IETF draft 'draft-nottingham-http-problem-06'.

$ul: **detail**: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. [Learn more about errors](/developer/guides/get-started-with-mailchimp-api-3/#Errors).
**instance**: A string that identifies this specific occurrence of the problem. Please provide this ID when contacting support.
**status**: The HTTP status code (RFC2616, Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.
**title**: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It shouldn't change based on the occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization.
**type**: An absolute URI that identifies the problem type. When dereferenced, it should provide human-readable documentation for the problem type.
